price: 11. Cagalah ku-meesisso tu-kah xiqtam Qhuraan kataateeh, qellut Yallak meesite numu, toysa kaa ayti-kumus dambi cabtii kee kaxxa galtól (jannat kinnuk).
arabic: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَخَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِمَغۡفِرَةٖ وَأَجۡرٖ كَرِيمٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innamā tundhiru mani ittabaʿa al-dhik'ra wakhashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi fabashir'hu bimaghfiratin wa-ajrin karīmin
